title: PBE Accounts Recovery.
body: I was recently told from a friend that anyone honor level 4 and above can get/create a PBE Account. I recently created one, but for some reason my password/user name is incorrect, is there anyway we can recover the PBE Username/Pass to be able to use it?

replies.body: When you make youre new PBE account, you're prompted to make a username specific to the PBE so it's not your Live account credentials.  Hit us up inthrough an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can assist in locating your PBE account. :D
